attributes.action: Everyone stands on the right of the escalator unless you're walking through. Failure to comply will result in a legally allowed beating death.
attributes.additional_details:
Enough is enough! Everyone stands on the usual right of the escalator allowing a corridor for more hurried populace. Failure to comply means we can legally hurl you from the escalator.

Also some kind of award would be nice. Like tea or biscuits.
